fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Business and Industry, Research and innovation, External Relations
head_office_address: Zenith Building  Koning Albert II-laan | Boulevard Roi Albert II, 37
eu_initiatives: Promoting economic and trade relations between China and the EU. Organisation of high-level EU-China conferences.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: National Chambers of Commerce related to China
relevant_communication: Presentation of EU-China Conferences related to trade & investment
goals__remit:
The EU–China Business Association (EUCBA) is the EU-wide federation of national non-profit business organisations in the European Union with specialization and particular expertise in exchange of knowledge on investments and trade with China.  
 
EUCBA promotes direct investment and trade between China and the EU through international exchange of information and joint projects of its members – providing European companies a stronger base for expanding trade cooperation with China.
